simplified: 三十年河东，三十年河西

pronunciation.pinyin: sān shí nián hé dōng , sān shí nián hé xī
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: san1 shi2 nian2 he2 dong1 , san1 shi2 nian2 he2 xi1

details.simplified: 三十年河东，三十年河西
details.traditional: 三十年河東，三十年河西

meanings.value: the river flows thirty years to the East, thirty years to the West (proverb)
